cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.ST

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of best arm identification in stochastic bandit settings, which is a well-studied problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also involves the analysis of sample complexity and lower bounds, which are common themes in the subfield of theoretical machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper involves concepts from information theory (cs.IT) and statistics (cs.ST), which are relevant to the analysis of stochastic bandit problems. Finally, the paper involves the design and analysis of algorithms, which is a common theme in the subfield of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS).
